score: 0 out of 1 people found the following review useful
review: Matt Damon gives another fine performance as he makes his way towards super stardom.  Rounders has an interesting story plot and gives the viewers a look at the world of professional gambling.  Damon is supported by a professional cast that makes for good viewing time.
